content: sylas cooper aka birch whitewood materials string of worsted weight yarn hearts plant green i used two different greens brown for the dirt clay/orange or any color for the pot darning needle scissors stuffing/polyfil hooks 3 75 and 3 50 mm cardboard optional slicker brush optional fabric glue or e6000 or hot glue optional stitch key chain s =chain s single_crochet=single_crochet half_double_crochet=half_double_crochet slip_stitch=slip_stitch st s =stitch es increase = increase magic_ring = magic_ring/circle blo = back loop only flo = front loop only notes this plant is made in three parts the pot the dirt and the plant itself the pattern for the pot/dirt is free sylas cooper | string of hearts plant | page 1 string of hearts various green yarns 3 50m hook note each strand for this plant is made separately and starts from the bottom and goes up so the hearts sit in the right direction 1 chain 4 2 work all of the following stitches into 4th chain from hook 2dc 2hdc 1sc chain 2 1sc 2hdc 2dc chain 3 and slip_stitch into worked in chain chain 1 around the main string see photos 3 chain to desired height for next heart repeat steps 1 and 2 4 repeat step 3 until you have the desired length of the string of hearts chain 3-5 at the end *finish leaving 2-3 inches of yarn for assembly create as many strings of heart as you desire to the fullness you want in your plant i ended up making 10-11 strings in total sylas cooper | string of hearts plant | 2 assembly needle polyfil hook start assembling the strings of hearts i like to assemble as i go put 2-4 strings into one stitch in the dirt see photos i use a crochet hook or a needle to pull strings through the dirt once you have the desired number of strings in at least two different stitches double knot them under the dirt to secure to assemble the dirt to the pot sew the pieces together using the finished yawn from the dirt i opted to sew just below the top of the pot to create more depth see photo filll the pot with polyfil or stuffing as you sew sew here sylas cooper | string of hearts plant | 3
